attributes.title: I WAS HORRIFIED! DON’T GET THIS APP!
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and when it finally did roaches invaded my house and stole all of my cheese and butter and kicked me and my family out of the house I called the police then the roaches stole the police cars and took it for a drive. They never came back but now I’m out of butter and cheese. I deleted the app and tried it again but this time I was horrified at what came to my house.Garfield  but it wasn’t the lasagna eating kinda Garfield. It was a healthy one. Garfield was skinny and didn’t like lasagna, so I deleted the app and decided to never get it again. DON’T DOWNLOAD THE APP PLEASE!

attributes.title: HIGHLY OFFENSIVE SO DISAPPOINTED
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app it made me genuinely nauseous. I could feel the toxic masculinity radiating from my phone. The level of racism, homophobia, and pedophilia vibes I felt had brought back my depression. I pray for America, I’m not voting for trump, a dog could run this country better. Periodt

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE.The app took three hours to download.Also there were so many glitches and it wouldn’t let me use the app.I believe this app needs to be taken down because there is very inappropriate content on this app.It has videos of Trump cussing every second and it has a very very inappropriate video of him making out with an 11 year old.DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: Blm
attributes.review: right when I got the app, an orange came on the screen and said “vote for me. You have nothing to lose” so he made me poop my pants 😻😻😻😻😳😳

attributes.title: Paybacks a b*tch 💋👄💋
attributes.review:
This app is literally the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. After just opening it ONCE my entire phone shut down and it’s been doing it ever since. I highly recommend the App Store take off this terrible app, it makes your phone completely unusable. I’m
Convinced whoever created this app had the intention of ruining iPhone users experiences.

attributes.title: A TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app sucks🤮 it just won’t load😡and it took for ever to download😤it also said really sexists and racist things😱I would not recommend.✨🧚✨

attributes.title: Gave me cat ashes😿😾
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app because i thought it would be a great game for my cockroach to play. And the app started glitching so much. And when i was in the pool, my phone was vibrating so much that it fell in the pool and electrocuted me. I was in a coma for four years and Kanye West was president. Just so you know, my cockroach was watching a Hated Princess Gacha Story and it committed suicide. RIP cockroach. 😭😭😭😭😿😿😾😾💔💔💔💔I know this is Trump’s fault because he created this app and made my cockroach commit suicide. I will be seeing Trump in court in about two weeks. Wish me luck. I was on my way to court and as quick as sonic, My cockroach came out from his mini casket and started filming TikToks but then realized that TikTok was banned in the U.S.A. so he went back in in his mini casket. In conclusion, this app should be microwaved for at least 11037 days because it deserves to die. 
😾😾😿😿💔💔💔💔😭😭😭😭
RIP COCKROACH 
GONE, BUT NEVER FORGOTTEN.
